about_the_game:
DLC-exclusive items that allow you to change the Sandras's appearance.

Ironclad Battleship Sail
Ironclad Battleship Hull
Ironclad Battleship Decorations
Ironclad Battleship Cannon

*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After receiving items, modify your ship via [Equipment] -> [Decorations] in the main menu.
detailed_description:
DLC-exclusive items that allow you to change the Sandras's appearance.

Ironclad Battleship Sail
Ironclad Battleship Hull
Ironclad Battleship Decorations
Ironclad Battleship Cannon

*Open [DLC] under [Items] in the main menu and select new items to receive them.
*After receiving items, modify your ship via [Equipment] -> [Decorations] in the main menu.
